response.overview: On the brink of ruin, the Hidebark people are about to be wiped out by the slaving organization, Caesar's Legion. However, their most ruthless warrior would prefer death to dishonor. "FALLOUT: LANIUS" will recount how a single man brings ruin to his people due to his lust for bloodshed and victory.
response.tagline: We shall see how brave you are when nailed to the walls of Hoover Dam
response.title: Fallout: Lanius
